# PED::REQUEST_STEALTH_MODE_ASSET

## Summary
Requests the stealth mode assets

## Parameters
* **STRING** stealthMode

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Used to prevent delays for missions peds getting in stealth mode, forcing stealth mode
